item.title: About Me
item.author: xiaoyun@looseleafapp.com (Xiaoyun Yang)
item.description: Hello I’m a software engineer and tech entrepreneur living in New York. In my spare time I like to contribute to open source software and tech blogs. I’m excited by opportunities that let me develop elegant solutions for obvious problems where there are no obvious solutions. I believe in automating wherever possible, and leveraging existing technology to quickly bootstrap solutions. My mantra is trial and error, which I apply to both building a startup as well as living a fulfilling life.
